items.sentence: Tom needs to be told that he\'s required to do that.
Tom did neither of the two things I asked him to do.
Tom\'s family sold their farm and moved to the city.
The bookshelves are built into the walls of my room.
The bridge collapsed when one of the cables snapped.
Tom told Mary there was nothing in the refrigerator.
Tom told me about what happened at school yesterday.
I don\'t think that I know any of Tom\'s classmates.
Tom is a gang member. You should stay away from him.
Everybody in the family wore glasses except for Tom.
